column4: Hey, I'm in need of help... The past few days, my CPU has been going nuts on my laptop. The CPU-light is constantly flashing, and the computer has become extremely slow. It sometimes even takes up to 10 seconds to exit the screensaver! What can have gone wrong?
run "top" in a terminal and see what is eating cpu / memory
right now trackerd is using ~45% of my CPU... Could it be that?
